questions: What are the expected properties for a given product?
What type of data is expected for the "review" property?
What type of data is expected for the "rate" property?
What type of data is expected for the "id" property?
answer:
## Expected properties. 
!!! Tip

    All properties are optional. If any property is missing it will not be processed and no error will be reported.
    
| Name   | Expected type   | Example                                                 |
|--------|-----------------|---------------------------------------------------------|
| review | string          | "This product exceeded my expectations." |
| rate   | integer         | 4  |
| id     | string          | Product ID: "1234-5678"    |
